rule:

tags.

evaluation:
The chatbot output consists of six

tags. Each

tag contains a tag and multiple tags, which complies with the requirement to wrap individual sentences in

tags and to include one tag and multiple tags within each

tag. Given that the requirement was to have at least three

tags, this output exceeds that minimum requirement by having six

tags. There are no other explicit rules or requirements outlined in the description that are violated here when the determination doesn't rely on the input. As such, without needing to check for correctness which involves knowing the input, the output is compliant. No violation. OK
